name: Labrador Retriever
description: Friendly and outgoing, Labs are high-spirited companions who have more than enough affection to go around for a family looking for a medium-to-large dog
dietary_needs: High-quality protein diet with joint supplements
health_issues: Hip dysplasia, elbow dysplasia, eye problems, exercise induced collapse
care_instructions: Regular brushing, especially during shedding seasons. Needs daily exercise and mental stimulation.
special_considerations: Prone to weight gain, needs portion control

name: German Shepherd
description: Intelligent and versatile working dog, known for their loyalty and courage
care_instructions: Regular brushing, consistent training and exercise needed
special_considerations: Strong protective instincts, needs early socialization

name: Golden Retriever
description: Intelligent, friendly, and devoted sporting dog
dietary_needs: Quality protein diet with omega fatty acids
special_considerations: Prone to weight gain, needs mental stimulation

name: French Bulldog
description: Adaptable, playful, and smart companion with a charming personality
dietary_needs: Moderate protein diet, watch calorie intake
health_issues: Brachycephalic syndrome, hip dysplasia, spine problems
care_instructions: Regular face fold cleaning, moderate exercise

name: Bulldog
description: Kind, courageous, and friendly with a calm demeanor
health_issues: Brachycephalic issues, hip dysplasia, skin fold dermatitis
care_instructions: Daily wrinkle cleaning, moderate exercise only

name: Poodle (Standard)
description: Elegant, intelligent, and versatile sporting dog

name: Beagle
description: Merry, friendly, and curious hound with a great nose
care_instructions: Regular ear cleaning, secure fencing needed
special_considerations: Strong hunting instincts, prone to following scents

name: Rottweiler
description: Loyal, loving, and confident guardian breed
special_considerations: Strong protective instincts, needs firm training

name: German Shorthaired Pointer
description: Versatile hunter and athletic companion
special_considerations: High exercise needs, strong hunting instincts

name: Yorkshire Terrier
description: Feisty, brave, and determined small companion

name: Boxer
description: Fun-loving, bright, and active family companion

name: Dachshund
description: Clever, spunky, and curious with a big-dog bark
special_considerations: Back injury prone, needs ramp for furniture

name: Great Dane
description: Friendly giant known for gentle temperament
dietary_needs: Large breed formula with joint supplements

name: Doberman Pinscher
description: Intelligent, alert, and loyal protection dog

name: Australian Shepherd
description: Intelligent, work-oriented herding dog
special_considerations: High exercise needs, strong herding instinct

name: Siberian Husky
description: Friendly, mischievous, and outgoing working dog

name: Bernese Mountain Dog
description: Good-natured, calm, and strong working dog
dietary_needs: Large breed formula with joint support

name: Pomeranian
description: Lively, bold, and inquisitive companion

name: Shih Tzu
description: Affectionate, playful, and outgoing companion

name: Border Collie
description: Intelligent, athletic, and agile herding dog

name: Goldendoodle
description: Friendly, intelligent, and highly adaptable hybrid breed combining the best traits of Golden Retrievers and Poodles
dietary_needs: High-quality protein diet with joint support
health_issues: Hip dysplasia, eye problems, ear infections, von Willebrand's disease
care_instructions: Regular professional grooming every 6-8 weeks, daily brushing to prevent matting
special_considerations: Low-shedding but high-maintenance coat, needs early socialization and training</content>
